Card 1.name: Sakura Sushi & Grill
Card 1.p1: Responsive online menu designed to facilitate placing pickup orders and displaying relevant information for the family restaurant. Angular frontend hosted on GitHub Pages and .NET backend hosted on Azure.
Card 1.p2: Github repo for frontend: https://github.com/njyeung/Sakura-Repo, live website: https://eatsakura.com, backend: undisclosed
